column1: The withdrawal of presidential pleasure under Article 156, cannot be

an  unfettered  discretion, 
nor 
can 
it 
be 
arbitrary,
unreasonable or malafide. The power of removal should be used only

if 
there 
is  material 
to  demonstrate  misbehavior,

incapacity. 
In  other  words, 
that  removal  should  be  only  on

existence  of  grounds  which  are  similar 
to 
those  prescribed
impeachment in the case of other constitutional functionaries.‚Äù
